title: No More Pricing Caps On Micro-Finance Loans, Says RBI: Report - NDTV Profit
content: No More Pricing Caps On Micro-Finance Loans, Says RBI: Report  NDTV Profit
description: The Reserve Bank of India has removed pricing curbs on microfinance loans given by financial institutions, the central bank said in a circular issued on Monday setting out fresh guidelines for microfinancing.
